text: I have added a few updates to the "Requirement Examples " at the end of "Use Case Template". <https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/Use-Case-Template>. I do believe we need a different place holder for the Requirement Examples.

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...

text: Hello all, I would suggest that we add a agenda point to the tsc on Thursday which covers the question who will evaluate use cases. I think this is a important point that has not fully adressed. I do see the requirements streem as a first instance for this evaluation but I think it should not be completely our role. The board , tsc and community should also have a vote on what use cases should be looked at in more detail.
Also mention that we have set a first deadline for the requirements sheet for Friday
<@U0MJ8DFB3>: the TSC will have the ultimate say, but the Requirements group was asked to vet them and prioritize them as input to the TSC
the board doesn’t have a role in the technical aspects… though they may have an opinion on scope of the project overall

attachments.title: Hyperledger Project Explores Fighting Counterfeit Drugs with Blockchain - CoinDesk
attachments.text: At today's Hyperledger working group, consortium member Accenture revealed the early stages of a project to use blockchain to prevent counterfeit drugs.
attachments.fallback: CoinDesk: Hyperledger Project Explores Fighting Counterfeit Drugs with Blockchain - CoinDesk

text: <@U0MJ8DFB3>: I give an update every week at the TSC. I committed to make a rev of the use case template by Friday. I expect to have that done tomorrow and to report it in the update. Thanks.

All, I made a rev of the use case template based on some of the discussion in the last meeting. Please take a look at and provide some feedback here, or in the Wiki page:  <https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/Use-Case-Template>  <@U0Q7KRNSJ>, <@U0UFDAS91>, <@U0MJ8DFB3>, <@U0NQY299A>
